title: Add gold and silver hexagonal background pattern to home and product pages

requirements.summary: Apply a gold and silver hexagonal background pattern to the home page that covers the entire page background
acceptanceCriteria: Home page displays a repeating hexagonal pattern in gold and silver colors as the background
Background pattern is visible behind all existing content
Pattern maintains visual consistency with the warm earth-tone color scheme

file_operations.description: Add CSS classes for the hexagonal background pattern using SVG data URI. Create a repeating hexagonal pattern in gold (#D4AF37) and silver (#C0C0C0) colors that integrates with the warm earth-tone color scheme. The pattern should be defined as a reusable utility class that can be applied to page backgrounds without interfering with existing color variables or typography styles.

Add a wrapping div with the hexagonal pattern background class around the existing Hero, Products, and About sections. Ensure the background covers the entire page height and is positioned behind all content. Maintain all existing functionality including smooth scrolling and section rendering.

requirements.summary: Apply the same gold and silver hexagonal background pattern to the product management admin page (AdminDashboard)
acceptanceCriteria: Product management page displays the same repeating hexagonal pattern as the home page
Background pattern is visible behind the product form and product list
Pattern does not interfere with readability of forms or product information

file_operations.description: Apply the same hexagonal pattern background class created in REQ-22 to the AdminDashboard page. Add a wrapping div with the pattern behind the AdminGuard-protected content including overview statistics, quick actions, and MarkupSettings component. Ensure text readability is maintained by keeping existing card backgrounds and contrast levels intact.
